title: FS: 1907-09 Dietsche Cubs Postcards Evers & Overall
author: jb217676

posts.post_title: FS: 1907-09 Dietsche Cubs Postcards Evers & Overall
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone,
Available for sale are two really nice, postally unused 1907-09 Dietsche Cubs Postcards of John Evers & Orvall Overall. Just a little bit of wear on these, no creases, bends or writing is present. Price is [STRIKE]$200[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$175[/STRIKE] $150 for the Overall and [STRIKE]$325[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$300[/STRIKE] $275 for the Evers. I'll also consider offers on each of these postcards. PM or post if interested and thanks for looking!
Jeff

Currently asking $425 for the pair. If someone is interested in taking both I can knock the price down to $375 for the pair of postcards.
Jeff
Still for sale, I would also be interested in trading.

$350 gets the pair and I'll include expedited shipping, tracking & insurance from Canada ($30.00 value). Thanks for looking! Nice postcards from a tough set.
Jeff
Moved to ebay, $.99 each to start!
